attributes.action: To get the council to allow CCTV around graves, in Canley crematorium, Coventry
attributes.additional_details:
I and many people I have spoken to have had their loved ones graves targeted and many things stolen from them at Canley Crematorium, Coventry.
Contacting the police and reporting it has had no effect as there is no evidence or CCTV around the actual grave areas.
It is heart breaking to the people that have lost loved ones and is becoming a far to regular occurrence, even the police lady I reported it to agrees the problem is worsening.
We all would like the government to enforce the Coventry City Council to put up CCTV around the grave areas.
